name: Vogeljagd
description:
Vogeljagd

A game about shooting birds from the sky.
Shoot as many birds as you can to reach the highest score possible in 60 seconds!

Current Version: V1.2.1 (Made for TIC-80 Version 0.30.0)

Controls: Mouse for aiming, MouseButton for shooting. F11 for fullscreen.

Play on TIC-80's Website: https://tic.computer/play?cart=147

This game was made in TIC-80.
Inspired by Moorhuhn and Duck Hunt.
